name: Combo-Duelist
description:
A one button rythmn game where you need to hone your ability to time your attacks and blocks according to the enemy. 3 bosses to defeat; 5 enemies in between every boss.
Good luck, and have fun :)

Note: WebGl version seems to have input lagg, and annoying audio issues, and gold is not saved inbetween runs. Would recommend the executable.

"Guide"
1. Click to start combo.
2. Click again in the appropiate timing
3. repeat, untill you fail a timing.

Higher combo means more damage, parrying enemy attacks is essential.
